a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rate from cancer by sex, United States, 1950 to 2021
The reported annual death rate from cancer per 100,000 people, based on the underlying cause listed on death
certificates. Comparisons may be affected by differences in measurement.
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized. All deaths in a country may not have
been registered with a cause of death.
